title: I don't like
review: It could be a great movie, but it didn't. Visual effects are very bad, not realistic at all. It would have been a very good epic movie if it had a crowded staff of extras or stuntman. Spartacus, made by Kubrick 60 years ago, is much more realistic.

movie_title: Star Wars: Episode IX - The Rise of Skywalker
title: Of course, the first trilogy is separate :)
review: Because I watched all the movies, I had to watch this. I liked the last film in the second series. I liked the last film in this series. Of course, the first trilogy is separate :)

title: It still works.
review: Years later, they made a repeat of this movie. Of course, it was not the same beauty. I watched the first movie again. Our childhood was also a very important movie. Visual effects still look beautiful. It's nostalgia to see the youth of the actors.

title: The movie gave me hope.
review: It was the most enjoyable Zombie movie I watched. The characters and the events were funny. In one way, the movie is promising, even if the world is at an end, people can have fun. I prefer this instead of 'the walking dead.'

movie_title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
title: is this film comedy ?
review: This movie is definitely the worst movie in the batman series. It is maybe one of the worst films of the Superman series. The movie is full of nonsense, I laughed a lot while watching it. They spent so much money, it was a pity.
